1.0.8.en: WAN address change better detected. Polling interval now settable in device settings.

1.1.0.en: Now only shows capabilities per device type. (Router or AiMesh AP)

1.1.1.en: Dutch translations, improvements in polling interval and allow lower values (with warning).

2.0.0.en: Improved memory usage, application flow, responsiveness and overall performance. New actions

2.0.1.en: Improved device triggers and added better unavailable message

2.0.2.en: Added warning for deprecated driver. Reduced unavailability of devices not being updated in time. (show warning instead)

2.0.4.en: Improved logging and exception handling in underlying node modules

2.0.5.en: Added external ip changed trigger, improved logging for better debugging

2.0.6.en: Added wan type trigger, fixed error when wiredclients are not found

2.0.7.en: Improved stability when network is not AIMesh configured

2.0.9.en: Improved getclientlist on asus firmware that has strange behaviour

2.0.11.en: Improved stability with updated npm package.

2.0.12.en: Added debounce time when something went wrong to help relieve stress on routers.

2.0.13.en: Fixed a bug with certain routers not having a alias property

2.0.14.en: Improved overall stability by handling errors better.

2.0.15.en: Improved logging of update state, switched logic of updating online devices
